body_html: @orionr Thanks for looking up the histories. I think we're fine to stick with the PyTorch versions, but do take a look at the find_library calls in FindNCCL for Caffe2 and ensure the directories listed there are ported over to the PyTorch one (see 5434228#diff-5df661110abfc4edc2e80c967077e235 for explanation)
body_text: @orionr  Thanks for looking up the histories. I think we're fine to stick with the PyTorch versions, but do take a look at the find_library calls in FindNCCL for Caffe2 and ensure the directories listed there are ported over to the PyTorch one (see 5434228#diff-5df661110abfc4edc2e80c967077e235 for explanation)
body: @orionr  Thanks for looking up the histories. I think we're fine to stick with the PyTorch versions, but do take a look at the find_library calls in FindNCCL for Caffe2 and ensure the directories listed there are ported over to the PyTorch one (see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/54342287fed769021543c0197a836eec94dd351d#diff-5df661110abfc4edc2e80c967077e235 for explanation)
